entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 40S IN THE AFTERNOON
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
